website_summaries.verdict: This affordable freestanding heavy bag does not sacrifice on durability for the price.
pros: Unique narrow base attachment point allows the bag to rebound freely to your hits
Offers height adjustments from 47 to 68 inches in 3-inch increments
Entire bag is easy to store and move around by rolling it along the ground
cons: The bag can move around on hardwood floors during intense and rigorous exercise

website_summaries.verdict: Many users don't mind the high price due to the overall quality and durability this bag affords.
pros: Users rave about the resistance and rapid rebound - features that most competitors lack
cons: More prone to bouncy movement than competitors, which some users don't prefer

customer_reviews.title: Filled with 250lb's of "play sand" from Home Depot ($3-4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Filled with 250lb's of "play sand" from Home Depot ($3-4 per 50 lb bag) does the job. It's still movable, but is able to withstand light to medium punching and kicking.
customer_reviews.author: Asterix

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It really does the job. I'm 5'9 180lbs and i still can raise the bag higher than my head for some over the head kick. Would like to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lam Tran

customer_reviews.title: DONT BELIEVE ANY OF THE NEGATIVE REVIEWS
customer_reviews.text: DONT BELIEVE ANY OF THE NEGATIVE REVIEWS about this bag being for kids or not sturdy.. . I'm 6'3 230 pounds and I train MMA on a regular basis. I got this for the COVID-19 QUARENTINE to stay in shape the bag itself stands at about 6 feet high (not sure of any children at 6 feet in height lol ) get a funnel and fill it with at least 200 pounds of SAND from home Depot it's 5 DOLLARS a bag No water needed. Durable and will buy for my nephews
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I am a martial artist and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Met all my expectations!! Love it! I am a martial artist and I can practice all my techniques on this bag. I filled it with five 50 pound bags of sand and have it sitting on a heavy mat in the corner of my workout room. It moves if I practice hitting it full force but not too much. I could easily add water and weigh it down more if needed. This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Training bag
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, my two boys like this and their friends do as well. Something the entire family can use
customer_reviews.author: A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 3 years. Use it 3 times a week, kicking amd punching full force and not broken. Filled it with a funnel and play sand. To move it I take the top off and just kinda squat pull it. Its really easy to slide on carpet
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not bad could be better
customer_reviews.text: Finally got my bag and set it up. I used cheapo cat litter from walmart for 5$ a bag for 25lbs. It took like 5 bags easily then the rest water. It still tilts some when hit i was hoping it had more stopping power but it works. Its heavy as heck now and i weigh a good 220lbs. It could be better padded and not so mucb plastic but it is what it is. Will enjoy it while it last
customer_reviews.author: aguitian27

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy this bag
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this bag. It's a great, quick workout. Although nervous about filling the base with water, I thought it would be the cleaner alternative to sand. It's pretty sable. If you hit it hard enough the bag moves slightly but that just makes you move along with it from side to side which adds to the cardio. For the money I spent on this, I am very pleased. It's a great stress reliever.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Solid Bag. Use with gloves. Use sand in base
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Used to use these at the gym before ordering one for home to have something to do during the COVID19 outbreak. After reading some of the reviews I decided to put in 250 lbs of sand and added a bar mat underneath to prevent from shifting. Still shifts but way less than the ones at the gym that were filled with water. Bag is good for cardio I think and less for heavy punching. Use with gloves. I have asked the seller, KJ Sport Shop if they could ship asap to avoid delays due to restrictions related to Covid19 and they shipped next day. Thank you guys!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great home gym addition
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my brothers Father's Day gift since he asked for mines a while back. He loves it, put the water in and was on it before he could even figure out who bought it. It came in early which was great since I ordered it late, but it didn't come with the gift tag option so he was stuck calling around before he knew who bought it. Lol!! I didn't want to tell him ahead of time so it would be a surprise. And it was.
customer_reviews.author: Oh Well

customer_reviews.title: Worst return policy ever!
customer_reviews.text: I received my order a few days ago, and without even opening the box realized the product is quite a bit smaller than pictured and would not work. I attempted to contact the company for a return only to find out they make you pay to return the item, charge a restocking fee and are very curt! Buyer be ware of buying this item because if you don’t like it or it’s wrong you are stuck with it, or have to pay a stupid amount of money to ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works as expected. It was filled with a ...
customer_reviews.text: This works as expected. It was filled with a lot of sand and still moves around quite a bit so I found that setting a barbell behind it with some kettlebells holding the barbell in place helps keep it from moving across the floor when punching it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Moves too much when my daughter hits it
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 13 year old daughter for Christmas. Within just a couple of days, found out that the bag scoots across the floor when she hits it. She's 13!!!! Not suitable for anything as even when she hits it softly, it scoots. She's chasing it all around the garage floor. I tried a rubber mat, but it moves right off the pad. I'll try something else as it is too big/bulky to return. DO NOT BUY THIS BAG UNLESS YOU ARE JUST GOING TO GENTLY TAP IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Renfro

customer_reviews.title: Bag and base made well.
customer_reviews.text: Received product in great boxed condition. Easy assembly. Bag is good firmness. We filled base with water. I bought for my 10 year old who is working on getting her second degree black belt. Bag does not stay in place with her power round house kicks and front kicks. Bag moves too much with every kick. Not sure if filling base with sand will be any better. We are looking into purchasing a better no skid mat to put under it. Perhaps that will help. Other than the bag moving to much when kicking it, it’s a solid bag. Bag and base are made well.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Great for Staying Home...Not the Same as a Hanging Bag
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty good. It's much better than any other standalone bag. However, if you really give it some good power punches it's going to move around a bit. Overall, it's a solid product for the cost. It helped me keep up with my boxing workout during coronavirus pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: joseph bisaccia

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy damp sand to fill it
customer_reviews.text: I had to make a larger hole to put sand on. Hardware store sold me wet sand which does no go through a funnel. It too 400 lbs of wet sand. Doesn't tip over, just creeps a bit
customer_reviews.author: shelley blair

customer_reviews.title: stars for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, very happy. I've been beating this thing silly and it holds up. Takes a lot of sand to fill it, so looking back I might have used water or water and sand. I accidentally ordered black, contacted the seller and they were able to change to the red that I wanted. They didn't have to do that as it was my fault for not paying attention, but they did, and I really appreciated it. five stars for the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Strickland

customer_reviews.title: What a step up!
customer_reviews.text: After my son destroyed a reflex bag in a matter of months, I was worried about the replacement. This is a great design that I anticipate none of the issues because the design is so simple. My son loves it and the only issue I can see it will walk around on you if you only use water and use it on carpets. If they would incorporate small feet on the base, it would be perfect. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: K. Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for limited space
customer_reviews.text: Moves a bit but if you have space to attack from all sides it is actually a feature. My 8 year old loves it too for his hojo undo. We filled it with water only. It’s nice because you can adjust for my size 6 foot or his size ( leprechaun)
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.  don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This moves when I kick it even with a mat. I just don't like how it is made, not strong enough. So I decided to send it back. Big mistake to purchase this. you have to pay for the return plus a 20% restocking fee. Ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: martha

customer_reviews.title: Good all around for punches and kicks, kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: All you essentially have to do is fill it with water or sand and set the height. It's just as easy for my 4 year old boy as it is for my 10 year to use. it's also good enough for a 175 lb male like myself. It's probably not as great for kicking because it's not "heavy duty" but it's good enough. Excellent and easy to use. Just got it today and put it to immediate use. I'd like to see a review of someone after using it consistently for 6 months to a year. That's the real teste. So far so good though. The heigh adjustment is pretty neat.
customer_reviews.author: Joshl74

customer_reviews.title: maybe good for kids / ladies, not as sturdy as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Either I am in the wrong profession (should have been a pro boxer) or this is not sturdy at all for a grown male, even with the base filled to top with water. Basically I can only hit it with 50-60% force, if I do 100 it will either top over or brake in half (I haven't tried but that's what it feels like, and base moves already with each punch, and that's sitting outside into gravel not a smooth floor)
customer_reviews.author: NikA

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a workout
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, setup was easy, using water now but not heavy enough, will probably switch to sand, or a combination. For my needs this is perfect. Can do punch and kick combos, and my daughter also like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Peel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Just received this a couple of days ago. My son and I have both used it. Great for working out. Easy to fill the bottom with sand or kitty litter to weight it down. Just cut the bottom out of a milk jug and use it as a funnel. It's easier if you have someone to hold the funnel, so it doesn't fall out. We filled the base with 100 pounds, and it is pretty stable for smaller people beating on it. I can't say how durable it is yet, but is seams pretty well made and shipped fast. I do suggest getting some gloves.
customer_reviews.author: lbsch

customer_reviews.title: I love the adjustable height
customer_reviews.text: I does the job well!!! I love the adjustable height . My daughter loves it as well. I put water in it.. I'm a third floor apt but it doesn't bother my neighbors. It is very stable and put together well that even the hardest hit won't compromise it's stability. I would reccomend it. I did extensive research and this one came up multiple times , am very pleased that I chose this one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this for our home boxing setup
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a couple of months and it works great! We wanted to box at home. Use a big funnel and fill with sand, barely any mess. Some people complained of it moving during a workout. We use it on hardwood on a cheap gym mat and it sticks pretty well. I have to adjust it 2 or 3 times during a hard workout but it’s easy and moving it is a good workout!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good boxing stand
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Hardest part was threading a hose through the basement window to fill it up. If you hit hard this thing is gonna tip and then fall back into place. But for lighter hits and speed workouts this thing is perfect. Even for bigger hits I can deal with the rocking. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Only works on ground floor
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT good for anyone who does not live on the ground floor of their home, meaning lives in an apartment, high rise, whatever. It will shake your entire floor. I would have really appreciated this information before purchasing this as I was not able to return it and am out $200 :(
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Stands strong!!!
customer_reviews.text: We used an oil gallon to fill it up. It fit perfect. We used 300 pounds of dry sand and just went in so easily. Less than 20 minutes. First my husband made a mistake as usual. Failed to read. And bought semi moist sand. We could have been days trying to get that in. He went back and asked for dry. We didn't take long. He shook it after every bag and it doesn't move at all. 6 packs of 50 pounds of play sand the dry one. I'll update in a few months. Can only speak on the experience of setting up the container of the boxing bag equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Alimah

customer_reviews.title: Bag moves all over the place - crappy base too weak.
customer_reviews.text: Im 5’3” 120 ponds and I’m 53 years old. I was able to knock this bag all over the room. I filled it with water, per their directions. I returned it and they still have not refunded my money. I have proof of delivery back to you. You should not be allowed to sell on Amazon! Bad product and bad company!!!
customer_reviews.author: CatSlat

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied, great value product.
customer_reviews.text: Love my new punching bag. I gave it the beating of a lifetime and held-up well. I wish I could say the same for my knuckle. 😂 The company followed up to make sure I was fully satisfied with my purchase, they are very professional and provide quality products. I would strongly encourage you to purchase from them, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Al Huitron

customer_reviews.title: Punching bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this punching bag to get some exercise while releasing some stress during COVID19. I used water to fill it up because I couldn't access any sand. I live in a building and use this in my room. Needless to say it is very loud. You can't punch too hard or it shakes the whole place, the vibration is crazy. I still like it tho. I just wish it was more sturdy. As you can see I used two pillows to kind of reduce the vibration.
customer_reviews.author: Ellissia Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: This punching bag is great the only thing is when filling it with water it isn't heavy enough to stay still when you hit it. Just so you know I am no boxer I am 53 and I got the bag for exercise. I put sand in it and it is much better. It might rock but not that bad. It is a good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It is hard to fill up with sand.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage son. I will have to say it still moves even after filled with sand. We are going to fill it with more sand to see if it helps. My biggest complaint is it is hard to fill with sand. It would be nice if the opening was bigger or better instructions were given on an easier way to fill it. We didn't want to chance water and maybe have a leak onto the floor.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie whitis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I followed the recommendations from others and filled the bag with 300lbs of sand. Powerpunches will make the bag move around but other than that everything else seems great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love to kick and punch this thing.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one--only because I couldn't fit the first on our moving van. I seriously love to kick and punch this thing. The best part is imagining my ex's face on it. Makes my roundhouse kicks so much more satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Dr W

customer_reviews.title: So I love the bag
customer_reviews.text: So I love the bag, strong and withstands punching . I may be a woman . Lol, but I pack a strong punch. I read all the reviews, bought the sand and filled half sand and half water. Easier. And rolled it to its destination in my basement with rug underneath . Works great.
customer_reviews.author: kathy J

customer_reviews.title: Good 👍Bag / Add Sand not water
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good bag! Be sure to put sand in it not water Water moves Sand makes it solid and it will not move Get Sand from Lowe's or Home Depot I puto over 200 pounds in mine I can't remember right off 250-300 pounds of sand in base I then add water to just wash down sand ( adding a little water makes room for more sand) Keep repeating till it's full.. I Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Mont

customer_reviews.title: We didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: The material is plastic, You have to fill the tank with alot of water or sand
customer_reviews.author: Borhanfard. zuzu

customer_reviews.title: For kids
customer_reviews.text: For kids I donated it to a 13 year old girl
customer_reviews.author: gaby safi

customer_reviews.title: Surprising quality in this training bag - very happy with the ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I read the feedback on this and thought I was taking a chance - I wasn't! This bag is well-made and does the job! I didn't expect a professional quality item - I wanted something I could learn with and get a workout and I got it! I think anyone who doesn't try to 'kill' the bag and follows the basic instructions that come with it will be happy. Easily adjusts for varied heights - my wife and I are both using the bag and we get a good workout with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’8 and 190lbs and I go hard with this and it’s not bad. It does move a little but you can always punch around it. Tip Use sand and add more water to the sand and it will move less.
customer_reviews.author: Nomi

customer_reviews.title: Century Original Wavemaster Freestanding Heavy Punching Bag
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to take kickboxing classes for a while but could never find classes to fit my schedule. Now with Covid-19, going to any class is out of the question. I purchased this Century Original Wavemaster Freestanding Heavy Punching Bag to do training on my own. It is very sturdy. I filled the base with sand and it barely moves when punched or kicked.
customer_reviews.author: Raine

customer_reviews.title: Good Seller, Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased one of these and the bag came with the box crushed and repackaged poorly by fedex. This seller sent me a brand new one. Very happy with the product. Solid construction and with enough sand it doesn't move as much as you would think.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best product for my home workout!
customer_reviews.text: Century did an Amazing job shipping and packaging it quickly. Was shipped the very next day. Package was secure as can be. No marks, dents or scratches. Most reviews say they only fill with 75lbs, however if your doing kickboxing or Muay Thai and love to kick, then definitely fill it with 125 to 150 lbs. All the weight does sit at base. So realistically adding more weight will help the upper half. This isn’t anything wrong with product or how it’s designed. Design and product is one of the best workout/training product I have purchased. Thanks a lot Century for serving the Martial Arts community :)
customer_reviews.author: JayE

customer_reviews.title: Good size bag for at home workout!
customer_reviews.text: This bag works great for my teenage daughter! It’s very easy to assemble and pretty easy to move around. It doesn’t take up too much room so it’s perfect for the garage or an indoor exercise room. It does need to be against a stable wall so it doesn’t move around too much. Great purchase and price!
customer_reviews.author: MJmom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent training equipment for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Taekwondo instructor and have used Wavemaster for many years. Purchased this Wavemaster for my 13 year old grandson. He's into MMA and he train viciously on it. He take the striking pad off, stadles it & practices ground & pound also. His dad put just enough water in it so my grandson can move it himself and he uses it indoor& outdoors. Excellent training equipment for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Opend

customer_reviews.title: just set it up today
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little nervous about the underside of the pad because you can see the padding inside but hopefully it won't be an issue- easy to fill with sand I'm starting at 200lbs (the directions say not to exceed 250lbs) and we'll see how it goes, I'm hoping it's more durable than it looks- but it was super easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bag. Had to fill the base with 300lbs of pea gravel and top it off with water to keep it from sliding when punched, but the bag it's self is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: dugg

customer_reviews.title: Good for the kids
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, but not great. Probably better for kids. If you're an adult and you really start working the bag, it tends to move around a lot. Also, its probably better to fill it with sand rather than water as the cap does leak when it moves around. The leak isn't bad, but not really good either. Probably a better bag for the kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: After 350 lbs of playsand it is pretty much staying put. After a number of heavy punches, it will be a little out of its original place by a few inches. I had it on a carpet. I'd then go to the other side and continue punching until it is back it is original place. I am happy with this investment
customer_reviews.author: Joven

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Be ready to fill it with a lot of sand. It will still slightly move when you punch it. Then, you move and punch it from the other side to move it back. :)
customer_reviews.author: MimiCupcake

customer_reviews.title: This thing has been great. I've had it for years and it's still ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been great. I've had it for years and it's still holding up well enough. It's fairly easy to push around, however, so make sure that you have some room while you're using it. Kicks tend to make the striking surface slide back down the pole.
customer_reviews.author: WendigoRunner

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for 6 months since my gym closed and it's definitely worth the investment. I filled it about 2/3 full with sand and have had no problems. I've never knocked it over (even with kicks) but it's still possible to move around as needed. I don't mind that it moves a bit as I use it all. As another reviewer said, it's not like an opponent will stand still.
customer_reviews.author: C. Baltes

customer_reviews.title: Love my bag!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bag at the onset of the pandemic and my gym closed. It arrived on time and as expected. I currently have the base filled with water so my bag moves around with strong hits and front kicks. Sand filling would be better and increase stability. Overall happy with the purchase and would recommend this bag for moderate home work outs. Affordable solution to my home boxing needs.
customer_reviews.author: HMcD1117

customer_reviews.title: Nice punching bag
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this punching bag for years and it has been great for me and durable as well during my use it. The height adjusts well and doesn’t take up too much space. I don’t use gloves or pads while training with it and it doesn’t rough my skin up too much. It can move a little as you strike, but doesn’t fall over or break. Great piece of training equipment overall.
customer_reviews.author: IA-MG

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag for kickboxing and punching in my home gym. I
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag for kickboxing and punching in my home gym. I filled with sand i purchased from Lowe's and works great still. If you buy the right kind of sand from the store, it's very easy to put into bag & use immediately. You can decide how much same by the lb and increase the sand if you punch harder.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Good for At-Home Workouts
customer_reviews.text: I filled this with water and not sand, and like other reviewers have said it does move a bit, but it depends how hard you're kicking or punching. I have no issues scooting it back to where I need it to be. The shipping was faster than what was advertised, and assembling it was as easy as putting the punching part on top of the stand, then adjusting the height as necessary. It's a big pricey and requires somewhat of a commitment to get your money's worth, but not bad for working out in the garden or garage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing ...
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews about this before buying it and I can confirm that,if you fill it with water, it will move. Which i don't mind at all. When I lock myself into the garage with this, it is fun to chase the "big fella" around the garage until i can no more. The kids love it and the height adjustment is very easy to work. I really like this one. It is sturdy and a great exercise tool!
customer_reviews.author: Somewhere in CA

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: I used a mix of wet and dry sand to fill the base. That was the most tedious part and lengthy assemble. I didn’t want my bag to move much at all while using and not planning on moving my bag. The sand filling took me about 2 hours to fill and messy. Once it was, the bag was great. I’ve used it a few times and haven’t had any issues. I love that you can adjust the bag height too! Shipping was fast and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works much better than Apple's mult av adapter and for much less
customer_reviews.text: Really happy I bought this! I wish I found out about this product before I bought Apple's multi av adapter. Not only was the Apple version more expensive but I kept having issues with it when I had all three ports in use at the same time. I'm using this product right now with all three ports in use and it is working out very well. I'm currently using it on a 2017 Macbook Pro with touchbar and I have power plugged into the USB-C input, a dell monitor plugged into the hdmi input and a usb drive in the USB-A input.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted with how easy this was to assemble, took me 5 minutes at most. I read the reviews about issues with it sliding so I put mine on top of an old yoga mat I no longer use, worked like a charm! Mine is filled with water and after months of use I have had no issue with leaking. Purchased this back in April and use it daily, still looks and feels new!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Harned

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son that does Krav Maga. He LOVES it. I can hear him in the garage kicking and punching it all the time. It is sturdy and it can be adjusted to raise high. My son is 6'2 ft and its perfect. Does not get knocked over easily. I've tried it out and was surprised by the force that it can handle. Good purchase and FAST shipping.
customer_reviews.author: ImsexynIride1

customer_reviews.title: Buy one!
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family is in training, so this is just a must for us. It takes about 160 lbs of sand and then you can punch and kick until you drop.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for a few months and it's tough as hell and worth every penny. I kick very hard and have a naturally heavy hand so a bag with the purpose of a sweat or speed workout will still suffer this thing is perfect filled with water. But I do have to make sure I hit it in the direction I need it to move.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent investment
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for a couple of months and pound it about three time per week, so far so good. Exterior material holding ok. It moves when punching hard but I pace it in one direction and back, no big deal. I used water instead of sand to fill up the base.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my son was looking for! He's a shorter 11 yr old, and it works perfect with plenty of room for growth.
customer_reviews.author: mamachaca

customer_reviews.title: Versatile practice equipment for adults and kids
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described. Easy to assemble and fill with water for stability. Provides good padding for practice and adjustable height to accommodate kids and adults. The only drawback is that it travels as you kick and punch unless you set it on a skid-proof surface.
customer_reviews.author: Feika

customer_reviews.title: Just what my son wanted, but even when full ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what my son wanted, but even when full of water, it lifts off the ground when kicked. That makes it thud loudly on our hard floor even with a pad under it. It also makes it scoot off the pad and across the floor. It still gets used plenty, though!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: Better for a child into Kicknoxing
customer_reviews.text: This is better for a child. I like that the height is adjustable, however, when filled with water, it moves way way too much and you cannot do front kicks on it. You can do roundhouses, however, it moves wya too much. I felt like I couldn’t actually punch it hard.
customer_reviews.author: Customer from Plainfield, IL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my home gym needs
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient and easy to move around and use in my house. I love that I didn't need to mount anything and that it hardly takes up any space. When I'm not using it, I can roll it into the corner. It is really loud banging on the floor though. So loud I couldn't even stand to use it at all before I got a mat to go underneath it. We use these same ones at my martial arts gym too. Can't really think of any disadvantage. Perhaps just that it moves around a bit. But easy to roll back. Great product especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Mae

customer_reviews.title: my kids love it
customer_reviews.text: This bag is good for kids but definitely not suitable for adults. I fill the bag base with water. The bag moves a lot when I throw punches at it. There is no way water can hold this bag sturdy for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Ting Dai

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It moves. Really. Only suitable for house basement, not for apartment.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: For me...5stars
customer_reviews.text: I filled with water, and it works great. After a few uses, instructions state to open the cap to release air pressure. (Water evaporates) As other reviews have stated, it does move a bit, although not much different than a hanging bag, with anchor. For home use, this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great workout bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag came fast and I put it to use right away. I filled it with 150# of play sand but I'd suggest 200# as I'm no heavyweight boxer and this thing moved easily with little use. Great quality bag though and really provides a good workout
customer_reviews.author: mpq1969

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say - it works. Sand is much denser than water, so it stays in place better and causes less damage if it leaks/cracks.
customer_reviews.author: RichS

customer_reviews.title: Works great and will grow with them
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids to practice their Tae Kwon Do on (instead of each other ;)). Works great and will grow with them. Really light weigh, make sure to fill base with water - not sand! you'll never be able to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pandemic Exercise.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I wish that was easier about this was filling it with sand. Other than that it has been great for keeping me active during the pandemic and it has been holding up well. I filled my base with 250lbs of sand.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine yesterday and I put it to work immediately. It already came fully assembled and all I did was add 200lbs of sand, and a little bit water and was completely sturdy. I’m 6’2” and 230lbs once I laid into the bag it didn’t move. So for all you big guys this bag I definitely suggest for you.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Richardson Jr

customer_reviews.title: Works Well Outside
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I moved and had no place to hang a traditional heavy bag. I can't attest to its durability because I have just started to use it, but it seems like a good option for a free-standing bag to do cardio boxing workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quarantine workout equipment
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble. I couldn’t decide whether to use kitty litter or water to fill. I went with water. Seem like to moves when I throw punches. Overall am happy with the product. Also it arrived fast
customer_reviews.author: E shopper

customer_reviews.title: I’m so glad I picked this one
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I need it to be. I weighed the bottom down with A LOT of sand but it doesn’t move when I hit it so it was worth the effort, just make sure you have a funnel to get the sand into the base.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Mackey

customer_reviews.title: great training option
customer_reviews.text: Great training option for a small area. In my case, an indoor gym of approx 400 sq ft that includes numerous weight benches, etc. The only thing I can suggest as an improvement is engineer the base to not shift across carpet. Even with the base filled. Vendor shipped extremely quick, arrived boxed perfect, simple removal.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Bought for my son to use to practice Martial Arts without hanging a bag in the garage. Filled with water and works great for him he is 8 years old and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby D. Marples

customer_reviews.title: The bag doesn’t like to stay and my height when I do kicks.
customer_reviews.text: Tried fast kicks while it was adjusted in the middle and after some kicks it would fall down which was pretty upsetting. It’s on garage floor right now with 4 50lb bags of conkrete play sand from Home Depot 4.50$. I’m 5”2 127lbs and the bag likes to slide everywhere. That’s ok. I’ll put stubber mat underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: So much fun filling with sand. My son and I filled this with 4 bags of sand. I can see that I will need the 5th bag. It does scoot when we hit it. It’s in the garage on a carpet. I should try and put a yoga mat underneath. I love that it adjusts in height. We are all 5’2” and shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Yogimama

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, pretty easy to move around when filled with water. Probably better for lightweights.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this bag so far. Filled it with water so it does still move around a good deal. Suits my needs. I suppose this is a bit of a lightweight bag, but feels right for someone around 160 pounds. Love using it for MMA or boxing. Easy to adjust height too.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Steampunk

customer_reviews.title: Its great!
customer_reviews.text: Great, great, and great! I had this on my wishlist for a couple of months before being able to purchase it and I am so happy I spent the money on it. I have not filled the base with water yet because I'm not sure where I want to place it yet, but for now, my nephew holds it for me while I punch away and I hold it for him. We both love it.
customer_reviews.author: LaVeda D. Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to hanging bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for stand up floor model... the reviews don't lie I filled mine with sand and it took some doing along with time and patience - make sure it is dry or your gonna be baking it in the oven. It does require repositioning during the work out although it is not a huge deal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to move and adjust, great for its price
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag. I filled it with cat litter as I read that it was less messy and no worry about water leaks. So it has 140Lbs of cat litter in it, and it could probably hold another 20 lbs. It does still move when punching or kicking hard. I have had to brace it up against something while punching. It moves around easily and is easy to adjust. I would definitely purchase again, although I wish I could figure out a way to not have it move so much.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Pudvar

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my boyfriend he really liked it he’s adding sand to make it heavier this was a great buy a lot of the punching bags in this price range don’t come with the stand so I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Misty s

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great size holds up well to round house and punch Great Weight to roll around in garage Very happy with product ! I hooked on Pro Force and Great combination works great! Great when your working out alone.
customer_reviews.author: James Rutushni

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly and was well-packed. It is easy to adjust. And to punch it or kick it, well, it gives you a very good workout. It feels more real than a punching bag.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Truthfinder

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the perfect size. I wanted to continuing practicing my taekwondo ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the perfect size. I wanted to continuing practicing my taekwondo and just get a little exercise in and it's perfect for that. I'm a little short, 5'2, so the height is just perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: A.G

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’ve ever written an amazon review and all I can say is look at the photos and decided for yourself if you want to risk nearly $200 on ordering this item... just arrived via Fedex in a box that was not damaged at all and I opened the box to find this. do yourself a favor and look for another punch bag....
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: This product should be removed from the market. There isn’t anything good about it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Soto

customer_reviews.title: heavy once filled
customer_reviews.text: it will probably take three people to tip it over and let the water out so i can give it to my best friend's son it was great i just never used it very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: i shop a lot

customer_reviews.title: buying another
customer_reviews.text: this came very fast, perfect for garage use. I will be getting more. I'm a 265 pound heavyweight and this bag took a lot of damage.
customer_reviews.author: matthewrogers

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color but good product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the product in red, but received a blue one. Item is sturdy and good quality, but upset that I received the wrong color!
customer_reviews.author: Devika Seth

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting a good workout
customer_reviews.text: Use this almost everyday and it takes a real beating. Can be knocked around pretty hard and not cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Randal Mcfarland

product_meta.title: Century Original Wavemaster Freestanding Heavy Punching Bag
product_meta.description: Our best selling bag! The Original Wavemaster has a durable vinyl cover and high density foam. The base can be filled with sand or water and is rounded for easy roll relocation. Eight height adjustments from 47" to 68" allowing students to practice kicks and punches at different heights to take their training to the next level. Approximately 270 lbs when filled. Available in Black, Blue or Red Wavemaster is a registered trademark of Century, LLC. U.S. Patent #5,624,358 **Note that there is an additional shipping fee of $15.00 for this item.
feature_bullets: Fill Base with Sand or Water
Round Base for Easy Roll Away
7 Height Adjustments from 47" to 68" in 3" Increments
Provides Optimal Resistance and Rapid Rebound

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
